page.title: 05Traffic Survey
page.content: We made a traffic survey of Milborne Port over 2 days.Taking 30 minutes each time.We took the survey along the side of the A30. We split into two groups,one group counting the traffic to Salisbury and the other group counting the traffic to Sherborne. We found that there was more traffic on the second day,a Friday,than on the first day,but there was little difference between the Salisbury and Sherborne traffic. Most vehicles were cars some of which were holiday traffic.We had imagined that there would be much more traffic than there was.But we noticed that most of the vehicles were exceeding the speed limit.
